title: Assign a company signatory
description: The company signatory is responsible for electronically signing all government forms Gusto creates and is generally a member of the business or partnership. Each time a signatory is updated, we'll file a new Form 8655 with the IRS to give Gusto the "Reporting Agent Authorization" we need to file and pay your taxes. Your signatory must be authorized by the IRS.

signingOptions.label: Signing options
signingOptions.selfSign: I'm authorized to sign official documents for the company.
signingOptions.appointOther: I'll appoint another person to sign official documents.

signatoryDetails.title: Signatory person details
signatoryDetails.description: Make sure this information is accurate. We'll use it to submit IRS Form 8655 so we can file and pay your federal taxes. If you don't know who your authorized signatory is, please call the IRS at (800) 829-4933.

address.title: Signatory home address
address.description: To verify your identity, please enter your home address. If you're unsure what address to use, use the one listed on your driver's license.
